result.eng: It happened at the end of the last century.
result.ga: Tharla sé ag deireadh an chéid seo caite
result.orig: Tharla sé ag deireadh an chéid seo caite
result.html: Tharla sé ag deireadh an chéid seo caiteIt happened at the end of the last century.
result.ponchtml: Ṫarla sé ag deireaḋ an ċéid seo caiteIt happened at the end of the last century.

result.eng: The murder happened at the beginning of the chapter.
result.ga: Ag tús na caibidle a tharla an dúnmharú
result.orig: Ag tús na caibidle a tharla an dúnmharú
result.html: Ag tús na caibidle a tharla an dúnmharúThe murder happened at the beginning of the chapter.
result.ponchtml: Ag tús na caibidle a ṫarla an dúnṁarúThe murder happened at the beginning of the chapter.

result.eng: What happened then?
result.ga: Cad a tharla ansin
result.orig: Cad a tharla ansin
result.html: Cad a tharla ansinWhat happened then?
result.ponchtml: Cad a ṫarla ansinWhat happened then?

result.eng: What happened?
result.ga: Cad a tharla
result.orig: Cad a tharla
result.html: Cad a tharlaWhat happened?
result.ponchtml: Cad a ṫarlaWhat happened?

result.eng: When did it happen?
result.ga: Cathain a tharla sé
result.orig: Cathain a tharla sé
result.html: Cathain a tharla séWhen did it happen?
result.ponchtml: Caṫain a ṫarla séWhen did it happen?

result.eng: He referred to a case that happened fourty years ago.
result.ga: Thagair sé do chás a tharla daichead bliain ó shin
result.orig: Thagair sé do chás a tharla daichead bliain ó shin
result.html: Thagair sé do chás a tharla daichead bliain ó shinHe referred to a case that happened fourty years ago.
result.ponchtml: Ṫagair sé do ċás a ṫarla daiċead bliain ó ẛinHe referred to a case that happened fourty years ago.

result.eng: A famous battle happened on this site.
result.ga: Tharla cath cáiliúil ar an suíomh seo
result.orig: Tharla cath cáiliúil ar an suíomh seo
result.html: Tharla cath cáiliúil ar an suíomh seoA famous battle happened on this site.
result.ponchtml: Ṫarla caṫ cáiliúil ar an suíoṁ seoA famous battle happened on this site.

result.eng: We happened to be talking about you just when you came in.
result.ga: Tharla go raibh muid ag caint fútsa díreach nuair a tháinig tú isteach
result.orig: Tharla go raibh muid ag caint fútsa díreach nuair a tháinig tú isteach
result.html: Tharla go raibh muid ag caint fútsa díreach nuair a tháinig tú isteachWe happened to be talking about you just when you came in.
result.ponchtml: Ṫarla go raiḃ muid ag caint fútsa díreaċ nuair a ṫáinig tú isteaċWe happened to be talking about you just when you came in.

result.eng: It happened at the beginning of the year.
result.ga: Tharla sé ag tús na bliana
result.orig: Tharla sé ag tús na bliana
result.html: Tharla sé ag tús na blianaIt happened at the beginning of the year.
result.ponchtml: Ṫarla sé ag tús na blianaIt happened at the beginning of the year.

result.eng: It happened unexpectedly.
result.ga: Tharla sé gan choinne
result.orig: Tharla sé gan choinne
result.html: Tharla sé gan choinneIt happened unexpectedly.
result.ponchtml: Ṫarla sé gan ċoinneIt happened unexpectedly.

result.eng: It happened in past times.
result.ga: Tharla sé sin san am atá caite
result.orig: Tharla sé sin san am atá caite
result.html: Tharla sé sin san am atá caiteIt happened in past times.
result.ponchtml: Ṫarla sé sin san am atá caiteIt happened in past times.

result.eng: It happened back in Galway.
result.ga: Tharla sé thiar i nGaillimh
result.orig: Tharla sé thiar i nGaillimh
result.html: Tharla sé thiar i nGaillimhIt happened back in Galway.
result.ponchtml: Ṫarla sé ṫiar i nGailliṁIt happened back in Galway.

result.eng: What happened?
result.ga: Céard a tharla
result.orig: Céard a tharla
result.html: Céard a tharlaWhat happened?
result.ponchtml: Céard a ṫarlaWhat happened?

result.eng: Heavy rain fell later that week and floods happened in the place.
result.ga: Thit báisteach throm níos deireanaí an tseachtain sin agus tharla tuilte san áit
result.orig: Thit báisteach throm níos deireanaí an tseachtain sin agus tharla tuilte san áit
result.html: Thit báisteach throm níos deireanaí an tseachtain sin agus tharla tuilte san áitHeavy rain fell later that week and floods happened in the place.
result.ponchtml: Ṫit báisteaċ ṫrom níos deireanaí an tseaċtain sin agus ṫarla tuilte san áitHeavy rain fell later that week and floods happened in the place.

result.eng: The incident that happened was a relic of the old era.
result.ga: Iarsma den tseanré a bhí san eachtra a tharla
result.orig: Iarsma den tseanré a bhí san eachtra a tharla
result.html: Iarsma den tseanré a bhí san eachtra a tharlaThe incident that happened was a relic of the old era.
result.ponchtml: Iarsma den tseanré a ḃí san eaċtra a ṫarlaThe incident that happened was a relic of the old era.

result.eng: According to the professor, it is not at all clear why it happened.
result.ga: Dar leis an ollamh níl sé soiléir in aon chor cén fáth ar tharla sé
result.orig: Dar leis an ollamh níl sé soiléir in aon chor cén fáth ar tharla sé
result.html: Dar leis an ollamh níl sé soiléir in aon chor cén fáth ar tharla séAccording to the professor, it is not at all clear why it happened.
result.ponchtml: Dar leis an ollaṁ níl sé soiléir in aon ċor cén fáṫ ar ṫarla séAccording to the professor, it is not at all clear why it happened.

result.eng: He remembers an incident that happened one day.
result.ga: Is cuimhin leis eachtra a tharla lá
result.orig: Is cuimhin leis eachtra a tharla lá
result.html: Is cuimhin leis eachtra a tharla láHe remembers an incident that happened one day.
result.ponchtml: Is cuiṁin leis eaċtra a ṫarla láHe remembers an incident that happened one day.

result.eng: Then, one minute before ten o'clock in New York, a disaster happened that nobody expected.
result.ga: Ansin nóiméad roimh a deich a chlog i Nua-Eabhrac tharla tubaiste nach raibh aon duine ag súil leis
result.orig: Ansin nóiméad roimh a deich a chlog i Nua-Eabhrac tharla tubaiste nach raibh aon duine ag súil leis
result.html: Ansin nóiméad roimh a deich a chlog i Nua-Eabhrac tharla tubaiste nach raibh aon duine ag súil leisThen, one minute before ten o'clock in New York, a disaster happened that nobody expected.
result.ponchtml: Ansin nóiméad roiṁ a deiċ a ċlog i Nua-Eaḃrac ṫarla tubaiste naċ raiḃ aon duine ag súil leisThen, one minute before ten o'clock in New York, a disaster happened that nobody expected.

result.eng: Milosevic was not solely responsible for every crime against humanity that happened while Yugoslavia was falling apart.
result.ga: Níorbh é Milosevic amháin faoi ndear gach coir in aghaidh na daonnachta a tharla tráth titim as a chéile don Iúgslaiv
result.orig: Níorbh é Milosevic amháin faoi ndear gach coir in aghaidh na daonnachta a tharla tráth titim as a chéile don Iúgslaiv
result.html: Níorbh é Milosevic amháin faoi ndear gach coir in aghaidh na daonnachta a tharla tráth titim as a chéile don IúgslaivMilosevic was not solely responsible for every crime against humanity that happened while Yugoslavia was falling apart.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ é Milosevic aṁáin faoi ndear gaċ coir in aġaiḋ na daonnaċta a ṫarla tráṫ titim as a ċéile don IúgslaivMilosevic was not solely responsible for every crime against humanity that happened while Yugoslavia was falling apart.

result.eng: I have no idea what happened.
result.ga: Níl a fhios agam beo cad a tharla
result.orig: Níl a fhios agam beo cad a tharla
result.html: Níl a fhios agam beo cad a tharlaI have no idea what happened.
result.ponchtml: Níl a ḟios agam beo cad a ṫarlaI have no idea what happened.
